TEXT: Ceramic Fish (Cards and relics at the shop cost 20 less Gold.)
Maw Bank (Whenever you climb a floor, store 12 Gold. Right click to smash open and gain all Gold inside.)
Strawberry (Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 7. At the end of combat, heal 1 HP.)
Darkstone Periapt (Whenever you draw a Curse, draw 1 card.)
Pear (Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by #b10. Whenever you heal, heal an additional #b1 HP.)
Strike Dummy (Basic and Common Attacks deal 3 additional damage.)
Girya (At the end of your first 3 turns, gain 1 Strength)
Mango (Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 14. Whenever you kill an enemy, heal 2 HP.)
Old Coin (Gain 200 Gold. Whenever you gain Gold, gain an additional 8.)
Cauldron (Upon pickup, gain 1 potion slot and brew 1 potion of each rarity.)
Ring of the Snake (At the start of each combat, draw 1 additional card and gain 1 energy.)
Tiny Chest (Chests in Treasure rooms are more likely to be larger.)
Dead Branch (Whenever you Exhaust a card, add a random Exhausting card to your hand.)
